Description.Text: Jazz Hotel Chisinau is a traditional 4-star hotel offering elegant accommodation in the heart of Chisinau. Highlights include a gym, restaurant and a bar. Chisinau city centre is refreshingly modern with a fascinating political history. Situated alongside the Bic River, it boasts a diverse array of restaurants, bars, shops and entertainment. Nearby places of interest include Chisinau Botanical Garden, the Pushkin Museum and the Malldova shopping mall. Local bus services provide fast and easy access to other popular Chisinau destinations. The hotel is housed in a modern mid-rise building. Facilities include a gym and a sauna. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Classic rooms are approximately 20sqm and are decorated in a traditional style. They feature a view of the Chisinau skyline. Amenities include a flat-screen satellite TV, mini-bar, air-conditioning and a safe. The ceramic bathrooms feature a walk-in shower. The Jazz restaurant offers seasonal cuisine made with locally sourced ingredients. Guests can enjoy a range of cocktails at the chic hotel bar. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
